description:
After meeting Komiya Karina face-to-face, Arata senses something unfathomable from her, but can`t find a clue to the case. Then Aki Lee, the secretary of her opponent, Yakushiji "Heracles" Kousuke, is murdered. Unit One decides to split up to investigate both the attackers and their victims, but...
Source: Amazon

titles.title: ヘラクレスとセイレーン
